servinfo.title: Automatic Transmission Assembly Dismounting and Remounting

s1.ptxt: Dismount engine with transmission and transfer (4WD model) or extension case assembly (2WD model) referring to Engine Assembly Removal and Installation:J20A .

Disconnect connectors from output shaft speed sensor, input shaft speed sensor, transmission range sensor, solenoid connector, transfer actuator (if equipped), differential lock switch and 4L/N switch (if equipped) release their wire harnesses from clamps.

Remove transfer (4WD model) or extension case assembly (2WD model) from transmission referring to Transfer Assembly Dismounting and Remounting:Motor-Shift Type (Transfer with Shift Actuator) (4WD model), Transfer Assembly Dismounting and Remounting:Non-Shift Type (Transfer without Shift Actuator) (4WD model) or Extension Case Assembly Removal and Installation:Petrol Engine Model (2WD model).
Remove engine rear mounting member and rear mounting referring to Engine Mountings Components:J20A or Engine Mountings Components:J24B .
Remove drive plate cover, and then remove drive plate bolts by holding crankshaft pulley bolt stationary.
Remove starting motor referring to Starting Motor Removal and Installation:M16A and J20A or Starting Motor Removal and Installation:J24B and N32A .
Remove transmission assembly from engine assembly.

servinfosub.title: Remounting
servinfosub.ptxt: For remounting, reverse dismounting procedure noting the following points.

item.ptxt: Tighten each bolts and nuts referring to Automatic Transmission Unit Components:4 A/T
Tighten drive plate bolt No.1 (1) first and then tighten drive plate bolts No.2 (2).
Set each clamp for wiring securely.
Fill A/T fluid referring to A/T Fluid Change:4 A/T .
Connect battery and check function of engine and transmission.
